Powerball: Friday's results

01 Nov 2019, 21:03

Here are your Powerball and Powerball Plus results for Friday, November 1:
PowerBall: 13, 25, 29, 43, 47 PowerBall: 12 
PowerBall Plus: 04, 26, 30, 32, 36 PowerBall: 07
